name: Novikov Backpack
description:
Item Type: Heavy Backpack
Carrying Capacity: 120K µSCU
Core Compatibility: Heavy
Confidently explore cold environments while wearing the Novikov. Caldera designed a spacious backpack to compliment this advanced armor, so those venturing across unknown terrain can bring enough supplies to survive the journey.
description_cn:
物品类型：重型背包
储物空间：120K µSCU
可适配胸甲类型：重型
穿上诺维科夫护甲，大胆地去那天寒地冻之中探索吧。火山臼公司为这套先进的护甲设计了一个宽敞的背包来作为补充，使得那些浪迹于未知地带的探险家们能够满载着补给在旅途中生存下来。
